BIO

Hi, my name's Moneer Alasmar

I'm an innovative software engineer offering 3+ years of experience in the full software development lifecycle. When I'm not coding I enjoy learning about and enhancing my photography, hiking and spending time with my wife! You'll find more information about my technical skills below, just click to read more!

  • December 2014 - 2017
  • Bishop CA

Responsible for the overall restaurant operations execution and management of staff, controllable profit plan achievement, guest count growth, and sales building activities. Additional responsibilities include:

  • A focus on employee selection, retention, continuous operational improvement and a strong commitment to hospitality and guest satisfaction.
  • Prepare financial and operational reports and schedules, analyze data and develop solutions to ensure operating goals are achieved.
  • Direct restaurant operations with responsibility for guest service, brand standards execution and employee training
  • Ensure timely implementation, training and ongoing execution of all corporate initiatives and marketing promotions
  • Developed Restaurant Managers and hourly employees through corporate training programs, individual development plans and assignments; provided coaching and constructive feedback to employees as needed
  • Attract, hire, on board and retain the best hourly talent to meet staffing requirements and guest service standards
  • Develop and execute the local store marketing plan to build relationships with civic, business, school, and professional organizations to drive sales and guest count
  • Monitor that proper security procedures are in place to protect employees, guests and company assets
  • Create and maintain an enjoyable and respectful environment for our guests and employees

  • December 2008 – 2014
  • Los Angeles CA

Responsible for providing support with technologies to management and employees. Main responsibilities included:

  • Learn new software prior to company rollout and create clear user guides to be used by staff.

  • Managed various finances ranging from payroll to annual reports.
  • Participated in the hiring, managing, and training processes of staff members thus reducing employee turnover rates.
  • Worked with ownership to develop strategies for business improvement.
  • Worked with System Administrator to develop C# applications for tracking expenses specific to each restaurant.
  • Worked with System Administrator to develop online scheduling system with ability for admins to make adjustments. This greatly improved attendance performance.
  • Created online issue tracking system for managers to view and update status on various problems across their restaurants.
